level_rune_02-02.name: Broken Path
level_rune_02-02.description: Streets torn apart by war, the pavement turned inside out, walls torn down like paper - and the culprits that caused all this destruction are still lurking nearby.

enemy_hirman_2.description: All [Rockbreaker] and [Rockbreaker Leader] gain +60% HP, +250 DEF and +40% ATK and Invisibility

enemy_hirman_3.description: All [Rockbreaker] and [Rockbreaker Leader] gain +100% HP, +450 DEF and +70% ATK and Invisibility

enemy_bslime_1.description: All [Infused Originium Slugs] gain +40% HP and Invisibility

enemy_bslime_2.description: All [Infused Originium Slugs] gain +80% HP, +35% ATK, Invisibility and cannot be Silenced

enemy_bslime_3.description: All [Infused Originium Slugs] gain +150% HP, +80% ATK, Invisibility and cannot be Silenced

global_costrecovery_1.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 25%

global_costrecovery_2.description: Natural DP regeneration rate is reduced by 50%

global_squadnum_1.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 10 Operators

global_squadnum_2.description: Max Squad size is reduced to 7 Operators

global_forbidloc_1.description: 4 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

global_forbidloc_2.description: 8 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

global_forbidloc_3.description: 12 tiles on the map will no longer allow units to be deployed upon them

char_cost_guarddefender_1.description: The DP Cost of Guard and Defender Operators is tripled

char_cost_sniperhealer_1.description: The DP Cost of Medic and Sniper Operators is tripled.

char_exclude_sniperhealer_2.description: Medic and Sniper Operators cannot be deployed.

char_exclude_ranged_3.description: Long distance (Ranged) Operators cannot be deployed.
